import React, { useRef } from "react"; import emailjs from "@emailjs/browser"; export default function ContactUs() { const form = useRef(); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs .sendForm( "service_33qz9vg", // ‚úÖ EmailJS Service ID "template_fe", // ‚úÖ Template ID form.current, "7i6UI18nKRxT-_a2z" // ‚úÖ Public Key ) .then( () => { alert("‚úÖ Message sent successfully!"); form.current.reset(); }, (error) => { console.error("EmailJS Error:", error); alert("‚ùå Failed to send message. Check console for details."); } ); }; return (
